title: You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
body: How to fix this issue... i have it from 1 month it just randomly pops up when i am in loading screen?? And i should reconnect and i am losing 2 mins from the game and it happens randomly...

replies.body: If you've had this same problem for the past month you might need to adjust a few network settings to make sure you can get a more solid connection with our servers. Run through and update your port forward settings as well as flushing your DNS with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but also check out the other steps as well and let me know if that doesn't help.
